title: High Dependence on Travel Services
description: In 2023, travel services accounted for 73.59% of Lesotho's service imports, indicating a high reliance on this sector.

title: Low ICT Service Exports
description: Lesotho's ICT service exports were valued at only $15,183 in 2023, one of the lowest globally.

title: Minimal Threatened Fish Species
description: As of 2018, Lesotho reported only one threatened fish species, showcasing its relatively low impact on aquatic biodiversity.

title: Low Central Government Debt
description: In 2020, Lesotho's central government debt was just 2.99% of GDP, one of the lowest worldwide.

title: Poor Quality of Business Regulations
description: Lesotho scored 36.37 in the Quality of Regulations for Business Location in 2024, indicating challenges in regulatory frameworks.

title: High Female Enrollment in Secondary Education
description: In 2017, 57.38% of secondary education pupils were female, highlighting gender inclusivity in education.

title: High Female Enrollment in Vocational Education
description: Lesotho had 66.59% female enrollment in vocational secondary education in 2017, promoting gender equality in skills training.

title: Limited Rural Handwashing Facilities
description: Only 3.55% of the rural population had access to basic handwashing facilities in 2022, indicating significant hygiene challenges.

title: High Female Mortality from Unintentional Poisoning
description: In 2021, the mortality rate for females due to unintentional poisoning was 3.1 per 100,000, among the highest globally.

title: High Suicide Mortality Rate
description: Lesotho had a suicide mortality rate of 28.66 per 100,000 in 2021, one of the highest in the world.

title: High Mortality from Unsafe Water and Sanitation
description: In 2019, the mortality rate due to unsafe water and sanitation was 108.1 per 100,000, highlighting severe public health issues.

title: Significant Female Employment in Industry
description: In 2023, 38.52% of female employment was in the industry sector, indicating a strong female workforce presence.

title: High Adult Female Mortality Rate
description: The adult female mortality rate was 361.61 per 1,000 in 2023, reflecting significant health challenges.

title: High Adult Male Mortality Rate
description: In 2023, the adult male mortality rate was 470.60 per 1,000, indicating severe health issues among males.

title: High Imports from Sub-Saharan Africa
description: In 2023, 84.96% of Lesotho's merchandise imports came from Sub-Saharan Africa, showing strong regional trade ties.

title: High Dependence on Travel Services for Commercial Imports
description: Travel services made up 74.87% of commercial service imports in 2023, underscoring a significant reliance on this sector.
